languages.text: "Некие неразумные пытались его вывести за ошейник... Ох, бедолаги. Медикарии теперь не могут вытащить их оттуда, пока они истекают кровью. Почтенного проктора мы найти не можем, потому просим Вашу Светлость разобраться с этой зверюгой. Стрелять пса почтенного проктора мы... опасаемся".
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!

languages.text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."
languages.translation_comment: NOTE: the speaker here is High Factotum Danrok, NOT Ravor!
languages.original_text: "Некие неразумные пытались его вывести за ошейник... Ох, бедолаги. Медикарии теперь не могут вытащить их оттуда, пока они истекают кровью. Почтенного проктора мы найти не можем, потому просим Вашу Светлость разобраться с этой зверюгой. Стрелять пса почтенного проктора мы... опасаемся".

traits.locale_text: "Some witless fools tried to lead him out by the collar... poor sods. The medicae officers can't get them out of there now while they're bleeding. The esteemed Proctor's nowhere to be found, so we're asking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... not something we want to do."

"Some witless fools tried to lead him out by the collar... poor sods. The medicae officers can't get them out of there now while they're bleeding. The esteemed Proctor's nowhere to be found, so we're asking Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... not something we want to do."

"Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

languages.text: "Einige törichte Individuen haben versucht, ihn an seinem Halsband hinauszuführen ... diese armen Narren. Jetzt können sie die Medicae-Offiziere nicht bergen, solange sie bluten. Da wir nicht wissen, wo sich der geschätzte Proktor aufhält, müssen wir Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bitten, die Bestie zu bändigen. Wir würden es sehr gerne vermeiden ... den Hund des geschätzten Proktors zu erschießen."
languages.original_text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

traits.locale_text: "Einige törichte Individuen haben versucht, ihn an seinem Halsband hinauszuführen ... diese armen Narren. Jetzt können sie die Medicae-Offiziere nicht bergen, solange sie bluten. Da wir nicht wissen, wo sich der geschätzte Proktor aufhält, müssen wir Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} bitten, die Bestie zu bändigen. Wir würden es sehr gerne vermeiden ... den Hund des geschätzten Proktors zu erschießen."

languages.text: « Certains individus malavisés ont essayé d'attraper le chien par son collier pour le faire sortir... et l'ont rapidement regretté. Ils sont grièvement blessés et les officiers de la medicae ne peuvent pas les emmener à l'infirmerie. L'honorable proctor étant introuvable, c'est vers vous que nous devons nous tourner pour calmer l'animal, Votre Seigneurie. Nous préférerions éviter de... l'abattre. »
languages.original_text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

traits.locale_text: « Certains individus malavisés ont essayé d'attraper le chien par son collier pour le faire sortir... et l'ont rapidement regretté. Ils sont grièvement blessés et les officiers de la medicae ne peuvent pas les emmener à l'infirmerie. L'honorable proctor étant introuvable, c'est vers vous que nous devons nous tourner pour calmer l'animal, Votre Seigneurie. Nous préférerions éviter de... l'abattre. »

languages.text: 「間抜けな連中が首輪を引っ張って外に連れ出そうとしたんですが…哀れな奴らです。今じゃメディケア士官たちが止血しながらも彼らを引き出せずにいます。肝心の尊敬すべきアンサール代理人は行方不明でして、そこで閣下にあの獣の対処をお願いしたく存じます。尊敬すべき代理人の飼い犬を撃つなどということは…できれば避けたいのです」
languages.original_text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

traits.locale_text: 「間抜けな連中が首輪を引っ張って外に連れ出そうとしたんですが…哀れな奴らです。今じゃメディケア士官たちが止血しながらも彼らを引き出せずにいます。肝心の尊敬すべきアンサール代理人は行方不明でして、そこで閣下にあの獣の対処をお願いしたく存じます。尊敬すべき代理人の飼い犬を撃つなどということは…できれば避けたいのです」

languages.text: «Unos individuos un tanto carentes de sentido común han intentado sacarlo por el collar... insensatos. Los oficiales de la cubierta medicae no pueden sacarlos de ahí para tratar sus hemorragias. El estimado Procurador no se halla presente, así que debemos pedir a mi{mf|lord|lady} que se ocupe de la bestia. Disparar al perro del Procurador es algo que... preferiríamos evitar».
languages.original_text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

traits.locale_text: «Unos individuos un tanto carentes de sentido común han intentado sacarlo por el collar... insensatos. Los oficiales de la cubierta medicae no pueden sacarlos de ahí para tratar sus hemorragias. El estimado Procurador no se halla presente, así que debemos pedir a mi{mf|lord|lady} que se ocupe de la bestia. Disparar al perro del Procurador es algo que... preferiríamos evitar».

languages.text: “有些脑子不太灵光的蠢货打算拎着那条狗的项圈，把它拎出来……那些可怜的家伙，他们现在血流不止，但医务官也没办法把那些人弄出来。尊敬的监察官目前不知去向，所以我们只能请您来处理那条狗。虽然我们也可以直接射杀监察官的狗，但……我们希望避免这种结果。”
languages.original_text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

traits.locale_text: “有些脑子不太灵光的蠢货打算拎着那条狗的项圈，把它拎出来……那些可怜的家伙，他们现在血流不止，但医务官也没办法把那些人弄出来。尊敬的监察官目前不知去向，所以我们只能请您来处理那条狗。虽然我们也可以直接射杀监察官的狗，但……我们希望避免这种结果。”

languages.text: "Bazı aklı yarımlar, tasmasından tutup çıkarmaya çalışmış... Zavallılar. Kanamaları var, sıhhiye subayları onları salondan çıkaramıyor. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen de ortalarda yok, bu yüzden siz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden köpeğin icabına bakmanızı rica ediyoruz. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen'in köpeğini vurmak istemeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Some less than sagacious individuals tried to lead him out by the collar... poor fools. The medicae officers cannot get them out of there now while they are bleeding. The esteemed Proctor is nowhere to be found, so we must ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to deal with the beast. Shooting the esteemed Proctor's dog is... something we would prefer to avoid doing."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı aklı yarımlar tasmasından tutup çıkarmaya çalışmış... Zavallılar. Kanamaları var, sıhhiye subayları da onları salondan çıkaramıyor. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen de ortalarda yok, bu yüzden siz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden köpeğin icabına bakmanızı rica ediyoruz. Saygıdeğer Üsteğmen'in köpeğini vurmak, en son başvurmak isteyeceğimiz yöntem."
